name: Duel Voltage
description:
2 PLAYER
MOUSE AND KEYBOARD

Duel Voltage is a 1 versus 1 multiplayer arena shooter. As you defeat your enemy their side of the map goes missing along with any weapon spawns on that side of the map.  The first to make their enemy entire map disappear wins! 

HOW TO PLAY
  • Objective
    • Defeat the other player by making their side of the map go missing
  • Controls
    • WASD to move (up, left, down, right, respectively) 
    • Spacebar to jump
    • Right Click to aim down sights
    • Left Click to shoot
    • E to pick up guns scattered across the level 
    • Escape pause the game (won't pause for the other player!)
    • Tab (hold) to open up the minimap
  • Supported Regions
    • US
    • US West
    • Canada East 
DEVELOPMENT INFORMATION

Submission for the Texas Aggie Game Developers (TAGD) Game Jam Fall 2020 

Theme "Something is Missing"

THE TEAM

Erik Priest - Programming /  Networking /  Level Design 

Gregory Petri - Artist / Programming / Gameplay Design
